name: places/ChIJm1taFCBawokRLxSHSOhU8Lg
formattedAddress: 71 Leonard St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 71 Leonard St, New York, NY 10013-3420, USA

originalText.text: I have the privilege of knowing and working with the team at AE Design since they opened the office up over 12 years ago.  One of the partners and I have been working together for the last 15 years and throughout all these many years of business interactions we have become great friends.  As a contractor timely acquisition of permits/drawing/ calculations/etc is of utmost importance, the AE Design team provides all of these services and more.  They understand the contractors  urgency and as a result they are always attentive and extremely knowledgeable on how to navigate our NYCDOB needs and recommend the appropriate solution(s) in obtaining the required permits so we are able to get our boots on the ground and start the project. When I have an out of the ordinary NYCDOB/DOT/FDNY/etc agencies roadblock I don’t get frustrated anymore, the AE Design team is one easy phone call away and with all their experience/exposure to the many different agencies, they take the lead and simply resolve the issue. I highly recommend working with AE Design Solution team, you’re working with the greatest professionals in the business.
